The story revolves around a young girl named Lolita, who lives with her father, an old man named Humbert. 

Humbert, who has been living alone for many years, becomes infatuated with Lolita. He begins to spend more and more time with Lolita and her mother. He begins to keep things secret from his wife and his family.
